{{< include _preamble.qmd >}}

```{r}
#| label: load-gapminder
#| echo: true
#| eval: true

library(gapminder)
library(plotly)
library(ggplot2)
```

```{r}
#| label: animated-plot
#| echo: true
#| eval: true

# Create animated plotly visualization
# X-axis: gdpPercap, Y-axis: lifeExp, Frame: year
(gapminder |>
  ggplot() +
  aes(x = gdpPercap, y = lifeExp, frame = year) +
  geom_point(alpha = 0.6) +
  scale_x_log10() +
  labs(
    x = "GDP per Capita",
    y = "Life Expectancy",
    title = "Gapminder: Life Expectancy vs GDP per Capita (Animated)"
  )) |>
  ggplotly(height = 500, width = 750)
```
